panels.description: Histogram for the number of batches per (committed) blocks.

targets.expr: rate(quorum_store_num_batch_per_block_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(quorum_store_num_batch_per_block_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: NUM_BATCH_PER_BLOCK

panels.description: Histogram for the number of transactions per batch.

targets.expr: rate(quorum_store_num_txn_per_batch_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(quorum_store_num_txn_per_batch_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: NUM_TXN_PER_BATCH
